title: Timezone Notation
custom_steps: WHEN user loads MiLB League Schedule
custom_expected:
THEN Timezone notation should appear in top right corner of schedule view "All times ET and subject to change"
- Individual League pages should load timezone notations based on locations - https://beta-aws.milb.com/california/schedule/

title: Schedule text should appear as header
custom_steps: WHEN user load MiLB League Schedule
custom_expected: THEN "Schedule" text should be loaded as left-aligned header

title: Date picker control League Schedule dates
custom_steps:
WHEN user loads MiLB League Schedule or League Schedule page

ex: 
https://beta-aws.milb.com/schedule/
https://beta-aws.milb.com/international/schedule/
custom_expected:
THEN Date Picker should appear and control the list of games for MiLB League and Leagues schedules. 
- user should be able to open date picker and select date from calendar
- user should be able to select previous and next day

title: Class/League/Org filter for MiLB League Schedule
custom_steps: WHEN user loads MiLB League Schedule
custom_expected: THEN the Class/League/Organization filter should appear below date picker

title: Schedule should update based on selected Class/League/Org filter
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a Class/League/Organization selection from the filter
custom_expected: THEN the Schedule should adjust based on what is selected

title: Selecting Organization filter should reset Class & League filter
custom_steps: WHEN user selects an Organization from the filter
custom_expected: THEN the Class and League filter should be reset to only show Org that is selected

title: URL should be updated based on which filters/date are selected
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a date or Class/League/Organization
custom_expected:
THEN the URL param should be updated with what is selected

ex: https://beta-aws.milb.com/schedule/aaa/mexican/2019-05-02

title: Individual League Schedules should not have a Class/League Org filter
custom_steps:
WHEN user loads a individual League Schedule

ex: https://beta-aws.milb.com/international/schedule/
custom_expected: THEN the Class/League/Org filter should not be on the page

title: Game Description
custom_steps:
WHEN user views game that has a game description (Makeup Game, Completion of SUSP game, at different location)
- gets the message from `description` in statsAPI
custom_expected:
THEN each game can include a Game Description above game matchup

Example: "Makeup from 5/1 PPD"

title: XL (1304px+) - [club logo] road city name [score] @ [club logo] home city name [score]
custom_preconds: GIVEN user loads viewport in XL viewports 1304px and above
custom_steps: WHEN user views page in GIVEN viewports
custom_expected: THEN the matchup should appear [club logo] road city name [score] @ [club logo] home city name [score]

title: < 991px - Road tricode [score] @ home tricode [score]
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has page in viewports 990px or less
custom_steps: WHEN user loads page
custom_expected: THEN the matchup should appear road tricode [score] @ home tricode [score]

title: 1303px > 991px - [club logo] road team tricode [score] @ [club logo] home team tricode [score]
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has page set to viewports between 1303px and 991px
custom_steps: WHEN user loads page in GIVEN viewports
custom_expected: THEN the matchup should appear [club logo] road tricode [score] @ [club logo] home tricode [score]

title: City/Tricode names should link to Club homepages
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the team's city or tricode matchup text
custom_expected: THEN the city/tricode name should link to Club's homepage - https://www.milb.com/[team]

title: Game State appears to right of Club Matchups
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule page
custom_expected: THEN the Game State column should appear to the right of the Club Matchup column

title: Game Preview Status
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule pages
custom_expected:
THEN there are 3 options:
- MiLB League Schedule page should load games start times in ET
- individual League pages should load game start times in timezone based on league location (ex:https://beta-aws.milb.com/california/schedule/)
- TBD (for games without start time)

title: Game Live Status
custom_preconds: GIVEN user views Schedule page with Live games
custom_steps: WHEN user loads page
custom_expected:
THEN the Game Status for Live game should appear as 
- Warmup (before game officially starts) 
- [inning status abbrv] [inning number] - example: TOP 1 or BOT 3

title: Game Final Status
custom_preconds: GIVEN user loads page with games that are in Final state
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule page
custom_expected: THEN game that finished in 9 innings should appear as FINAL

title: Other Game Status
custom_preconds: GIVEN user sees games that have been Delay, Postponed, Suspended, Resumed, or Cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN user loads schedule page with Delay, Postponed, Suspended, or Cancelled game states
custom_expected: THEN Game Status should appear as DELAY [inning status] [inning #], PPD, SUSP, RESUM or CANCELLED

title: Game Finalized in Extra Innings or Completed Early
custom_preconds: GIVEN user views a game that has either been Completed Early or finished in Extra Innings
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule page with game Completed Early or finished in Extra Innings
custom_expected: THEN they both should appear as F/[inning number] - F/6 or F/12

title: All Game States should link to Gameday
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the game states (at whatever point they may be at)
custom_expected: THEN the game state should link to gameday - https://www.milb.com/gameday/[gamePk]

title: Preview State - [Away tricode]: Away Pitcher and [Home tricode]: Home Pitcher
custom_preconds: GIVEN Player matchups data is available for game in Preview
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule page
custom_expected:
THEN pitcher matchups should appear as [away tricode]: away pitcher [home tricode]: home pitcher
IF no pitcher name available, THEN use TBD as pitcher name

title: Warmup State - P: Pitcher Name [Away tricode] and AB: Batter Name [Home tricode]
custom_preconds: GIVEN game data is in Warmup state
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule page
custom_expected:
THEN player matchup should appear as:
P: Pitcher Name [Away tricode] and AB: Batter Name [Home tricode] - ex: P: Smith TOR AB: Ford CAL

title: Live State - P: Pitcher Name [team tricode] and AB: Batter Name [team tricode]
custom_preconds: GIVEN user loads game in Live game states
custom_steps: WHEN user loads schedule page
custom_expected:
THEN player matchups for Live games should appear as: 
P: Pitcher Name [team tricode] AB: Batter Name [team tricode]

title: Postgame State - W: Pitcher Name,  L: Pitcher Name, SV: Pitcher Name
custom_preconds: GIVEN data for Final games is available
custom_steps: WHEN user loads schedule page with Final game data
custom_expected:
THEN post game state should appear as: 
W: Pitcher Name,  L: Pitcher Name, SV: Pitcher Name (SV depends on data provided)

title: Delayed State - Display current Pitcher and current Batter
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is in Delayed State
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule page
custom_expected: THEN the current player matchup should appear during Delayed state

title: Postponed & Cancelled State - Display nothing
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a game in Postponed or Cancelled state
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads Schedule page
custom_expected: THEN a game in PPD or CANCELLED state should not have any Player Matchup info

title: Suspended & Resumed State - Display current Pitcher and current Batter
custom_preconds: GIVEN when a game is in Suspended or Resumed state
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads Schedule page
custom_expected: THEN the current player matchup should appear when game is in the SUSP & RESUM states

title: ALL player names should link to Player Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN player data appears for player matchups
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule page and clicks on player name
custom_expected: THEN the player name should link to the player page

title: TBD Player Matchups
custom_preconds: GIVEN when there is no pitcher data in Probable Pitchers
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule page
custom_expected: THEN for the Probable Pitcher spot should appear as TBD

title: Player Matchups should appear horizontally in viewports 860px+
custom_preconds: GIVEN user views schedule page in viewports 860px and above
custom_steps: WHEN user views player matchups
custom_expected: THEN the player matchups should appear in horizontal view

title: Player Matchups should appear stacked (vertically) in viewports <860px
custom_preconds: GIVEN user loads schedule page in viewports 859px and below
custom_steps: WHEN user views player matchups on page or within drawer
custom_expected: THEN the player matchups should appear in a stacked/vertical view

title: Delayed & Suspended state - Display MiLB.TV, Audio, Gameday links
custom_steps: WHEN user views game in Delayed or Suspended state
custom_expected:
THEN MiLB.TV, Audio and Gameday product links should be displayed

NOTE: not every game has MiLB.TV and Audio streams

title: PPD & Cancelled state - No product links
custom_steps: WHEN user views Postponed or Cancelled games
custom_expected: THEN no product links should be displayed for those games

title: MiLB.TV product link appear in Preview/Live/Final states
custom_preconds:
GIVEN game is in Preview
GIVEN game is in Warmup/Live/Final and has video steam
custom_steps: WHEN game has a MiLB.TV video stream
custom_expected:
THEN
MiLB.TV icons in Preview state should be grey and link to https://www.milb.com/live-stream-games/
MiLB.TV icons in Warmup/Live should be gold and link to https://www.milb.com/live-stream-games/g[gamePk]
MiLB.TV icons in Final should be grey and link to https://www.milb.com/live-stream-games/g[gamePk]

NOTE: not all games have MiLB.TV video stream

title: MiLB Audio product link appears in Live state
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule and views/clicks on audio link for Live game
custom_expected:
THEN during Live games, Audio product icon should be in grey and should link to TBD

NOTE: Not all games have MiLB Audio feeds

title: Gameday product link appears in Live state
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Schedule page for Live game and views/clicks on Gameday product icon
custom_expected: THEN Gameday icon should appear in gold and link to https://www.milb.com/gameday/[gamePk]

title: Box Score product link appears in Final state
custom_steps: WHEN user views a game in Final state
custom_expected: THEN Box Score icon should appear in grey and link to https://www.milb.com/gameday/[gamePk]/final/box

title: Preview product link appears in Preview state
custom_steps: WHEN user views game in Preview state
custom_expected: THEN Preview icon (newspaper) should appear in grey and link to https://www.milb.com/gameday/[gamePk]/preview

title: Tickets product link appears in Preview/Live states
custom_steps: WHEN user views game with Tickets icon
custom_expected: THEN Tickets icon should be displayed as green and link to home team's ticket page

title: Product icons in XL (1304px+) viewports
custom_preconds: GIVEN page viewports are in XL (1304px +)
custom_steps: WHEN user views product links
custom_expected: THEN product link icons should be on the right-most column with labels below the icons

title: Product icons in viewports 1303px > 568px
custom_preconds: GIVEN user loads page in viewports between 1303px > 568px
custom_steps: WHEN user views product icons
custom_expected: THEN product icons should appear in the right-most column without labels

title: Product icons in viewports below 568px
custom_preconds: GIVEN user loads page in viewports below 568px
custom_steps: WHEN user loads page in viewport below 568px and opens the arrow drawer
custom_expected: THEN the product icons should be displayed in schedule drawer on right side (without labels)

title: Suspended/Resumed Game State handling
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is in Suspended/Resumed state
custom_steps: WHEN user views a game in SUSP/RESUMED state
custom_expected:
THEN 
the SUSP game should appear at the bottom of the Schedule list
the RESUMED game should appear on the resumed date (if decided on)

title: No available games on day selected
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a date on Schedule page with no games
custom_steps: WHEN user views a day with no available games on Schedule
custom_expected: THEN there should be a message below date picker and filters that reads "No games are scheduled for the dates you selected"

title: Double Header handling
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a double header on League Schedule
custom_steps: WHEN user views a double header
custom_expected: THEN double headers should appear on Schedule list next to each other. With Game 1 being first and Game 2 being second, with start time being "Game 2"

title: Postponed/Makeup Game handling
custom_preconds: GIVEN Schedule has a game that is Postponed or a Makeup for a Postponement
custom_steps: WHEN user views a PPD or Makeup game
custom_expected:
THEN 
- the PPD game should appear at the bottom of the Schedule list (above Cancelled but below Final)
- the Makeup game should appear on Makeup date (if in data) and should have game description above matchup

title: Schedule page should only update w/new data on page load/reload
custom_steps: WHEN user loads or reloads page
custom_expected: THEN game data should update. Game data should not update unless user loads/reloads the page

title: Schedule list includes drawer arrow to expand view in viewports <568px
custom_preconds: GIVEN views schedule page in "mobile" viewports 567px and below
custom_steps: WHEN user views Schedule page in "mobile" viewports and clicks on drawer arrow
custom_expected: THEN user can expand list to open drawer which includes Player Matchups and Product icons

title: MiLB Schedule should flip to current date at 10am ET
custom_preconds: GIVEN intends to load the MiLB Schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user loads MiLB Schedule page
custom_expected:
THEN flip time to current date should be at 10am ET. 

Example: on May 5 > the schedule page should show games from May 4 until 10am ET and then Schedule should show upcoming May 5 games

title: League specific schedules should flip at 10am based on current timezone
custom_preconds: GIVEN user lives in PT, CT, MT timezones
custom_steps: WHEN user loads League specific Schedule pages (https://www.milb.com/california/schedule)
custom_expected:
THEN flip time should be at 10am based on the League specific timezone. 

so for California league, schedule should flip to current day at 10am PT
